xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 30 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 04:00 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 04:44 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 05:10 <kushalkhandelwal> is now known as <kushak124> 05:10 <kushak124> is now known as <kushalk124> 05:11 <kushalk124> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 06:22 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 10:24 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 10:56 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:56 <sdumitriu1> Hey ravigarg27 10:57 <ravigarg27> hii 10:57 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 10:57 <sdumitriu1> What's the status? 10:57 <ravigarg27> going good 10:58 <ravigarg27> I understood quite a bit about rendering of view 10:58 <ravigarg27> just had a small bit of confusion due to lack of knowledge about velocity 11:00 <ravigarg27> what does this statement (% class="group-title" %) implies 11:00 <sdumitriu1> Oh, that's not velocity, it's wiki markup 11:01 <sdumitriu1> That adds attributes to the following element 11:01 <sdumitriu1> So this actually ends up as an HTML class attribute 11:02 <ravigarg27> okay, but then where is actual HTML architecture defined 11:02 <ravigarg27> I mean how does this works then 11:07 <sdumitriu1> Wiki markup is converted to HTML through the XWiki rendering engine 11:07 <sdumitriu1> The process is complex, the entire https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/ repo is for the rendering engine 11:08 <sdumitriu1> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/XWikiSyntax#HParameters 11:10 <ravigarg27> wow!! everyday I dive into ocean of knowledge 11:10 <ravigarg27> :P 11:10 <sdumitriu1> Just don't try to learn it all at once 12:00 <ravigarg27> has quit 12:26 <sdumitriu> has quit 12:27 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 14:03 <ravigarg27> has quit 15:07 <BogdanVancea> has quit 15:07 <BogdanVancea_> is now known as <BogdanVancea> 16:55 <sdumitriu1> has quit 17:50 <BogdanVancea> has quit
